00002 #define NORMAL (RED_FOREG | GREEN_FOREG | BLUE_FOREG)
00003 #define BLUE_FOREG  (1 << 0)  ///< Foreground blue bit
00004 #define GREEN_FOREG (1 << 1)  ///< Foreground green bit
00005 #define RED_FOREG   (1 << 2)  ///< Foreground red bit

00007 //gap between screen limit and screenborders
00008 #define GAP 4
00009 
00010 //timer's led and border thickness
00011 #define BORDERTHICKNESS(HRES) ((HRES>=1024)? 3:2)
00012 #define LEDHEIGHT(HRES) ((HRES>=1024)? 9:7)
00013 
00014 //definitions for the coordinates of the timer's border
00015 //upper left x
00016 #define LEFTX(HRES) (HRES-2*GAP-6*BORDERTHICKNESS(HRES)-2*LEDHEIGHT(HRES)-8)
00017 //upper left y
00018 #define LEFTY GAP*2
00019 //lower right x
00020 #define RIGHTX(HRES) (HRES-GAP*2-1)
00021 //lower right y
00022 #define RIGHTY(HRES) (LEFTY+2*LEDHEIGHT(HRES)+4*BORDERTHICKNESS(HRES)+4)

00029 #define extremeX HRES - GAP - 1 //rectangle's extreme x value
00030 
00031 //corodinates for the lines in the game board
00032 #define firstLineCoordinate ((int)(lenghtSide-GAP)/3+GAP)
00033 #define secondLineCoordinate ((int)2*(lenghtSide-GAP)/3+GAP)
